Class: Logger

Logger()

Logger This class is used by all RFDriver classes to dynamically print logs and send logs to sentry

Constructor

new Logger()

Methods

Logs a message for log level 'debug'

Parameters:

args * <repeatable>

The variables to log

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
args * <repeatable>

The variables to log

log(level, …args)

Logs a message for given log level

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
level String

The level to log. can be 'silly'|'debug'|'verbose'|'info'|'warn'|'error'.
args * <repeatable>

The variables to log

getCaptureLevelLabel() → {String}

Get the label of the current capture level

Returns:

captureLevelLabel The label of the captureLevel. can be 'silly'|'debug'|'verbose'|'info'|'warn'|'error'.

Type
String

getLogLevelLabel() → {String}

Get the label of the current log level

Returns:

logLevelLabel The label of the logLevel. can be 'silly'|'debug'|'verbose'|'info'|'warn'|'error'.

Type
String

setCaptureLevel(captureLevel) → {number}

Can be used to dynamically set the captureLevel of the logger

Parameters:
Name Type Description
captureLevel String

The level at which logs are send to sentry. can be 'silly'|'debug'|'verbose'|'info'|'warn'|'error'.
Returns:

result The id of the captureLevel

Type
number

setLogLevel(logLevel) → {number}

Can be used to dynamically set the logLevel of the logger

Parameters:
Name Type Description
logLevel String

The level at which logs are printed. can be 'silly'|'debug'|'verbose'|'info'|'warn'|'error'.
Returns:

result The id of the logLevel

Type
number
